text: Graeme Ernest Lee (born 1 September 1935) is a former New Zealand politician. He served as a member of the New Zealand Parliament from 1981 to 1996. He was a member of the National Party before he founded the Christian Democrat Party in 1994. Lee was born in Paeroa, North Island. His daughter, Denise Lee, was also a National Party MP, from 2017 to 2020. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from North Island
title: Graeme Lee (politician)
